author: .vbuterin
content: I think the key thing to figure out is, for those contracts that have `SELFDESTRUCT`, what do they use it for?

author: .vbuterin
content: So here's one quick-pass thing that you can do: identify how many contracts that are destructible, that were created with `CREATE2` (and so can conceivably be recreated at the same address)

author: albusdompeldorius
content: Thanks for the feedback! Checking for redeployable contracts are already on my TODO list, and is definitely one potential use case that will no longer work after neutering selfdestruct. I will search for such contracts once I have extracted data about how the contracts were deployed.
